title: hi
body: i have adher account was hacked bay someone , name of account xXKingPain10Xx and my mail in this account was changed please somone help me i need this account becose i have many skins there please :(

replies.body: We can help!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) with details about the impacted account.  Our account team can review your case and assist you with recovery.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can through there!
